Morphy - Class in eu.kostia.morph
Wordnet Stemmer algorithmus as described in http://wordnet.princeton.edu/man/morphy.7WN.html Steps: First checks for exceptions (see *.exc files, that contains in each row the inflected and the base form) If nothing is found, apply the rules of detachment recursively until the the resulting string is found in the WordNet dictionary in the specified syntactic category If nothing was in the dictionary, return the word as it is
Morphy() - Constructor for class eu.kostia.morph.Morphy
